video_prompt: A grand hall bathed in dramatic, shifting deep red and black lighting. An anime-style woman gently floats in mid-air, her light hair swaying, eyes subtly shifting from calm to intense focus. Below, a kneeling figure's flowing black cloak subtly ripples. A vibrant magenta tendril pulses, undulating and intensifying its glow as it connects the two. Ornate red curtains gently sway. Glowing red runes on the reflective floor slowly animate and brighten, mirroring the growing power of the mystical connection.
